prestidigitacion.name: Prestidigitation
prestidigitacion.description: You perform a minor magical trick. You can create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as making a flame flicker, creating a sound, or cleaning a stain.

mensaje.name: Message
mensaje.description: You whisper a message that can only be heard by a specific creature you choose within range.

luz.name: Light
luz.description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius.

vicious_mockery.name: Vicious Mockery
vicious_mockery.description: You unleash a string of insults laced with magic at a creature you can see within range. If the target can hear you, it must make a Wisdom saving throw or take psychic damage and have disadvantage on its next attack roll.

fire_bolt.name: Fire Bolt
fire_bolt.description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target.

cure_wounds.name: Cure Wounds
cure_wounds.description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
magic_missile.description: You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack.
